name: Crudelis
description:
This wasn't Henry Shackelton's best day ever. He was a few tests away from making his obsession on bringing the people from the dead a reality. All in vain – his plans were fiercely interrupted by an attack of some bandits. All he's got left is 60 minutes of life.Main features
  • The last 60 minutes
    This is the last hour of your life. Don't waste it. Do only things you consider important.
  • Non-linear plot
    The world of 1896 is torn by conflicts. It's up to you which of them and how you'll deal with.
  • 12 possible endings
    Every decision brings irreversible consequences which will follow you until the end.
  • Emotional soundtrack
    Richard Wurth is a true master of piano and cello. His unforgettable melodies will accompany you through the whole adventure.
  • Handmade graphics
    Every location has been handmade to bring out its unique features.
  • Steampunk
    The game's atmosphere is heavily based on historical events that appeared during The Industrial Revolution.
